    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [CREATE]                                1         7
    [PROCEDURE]                             8         17
    [P]                                     18        19
    [(]                                     20        21
    [@V]                                    21        23
    [INT]                                   24        27
    [)]                                     27        28
    [AS]                                    29        31
    [BEGIN]                                 32        37
L2
    [DECLARE]                               2         9
    [@F]                                    10        12
    [INT]                                   13        16
L3
    [SET]                                   2         5
    [@F]                                    6         8
    [=]                                     9         10
    [@V]                                    11        13
    [+]                                     14        15
    [2]                                     16        17
L4
    [SELECT]                                2         8
    [@F]                                    9         11
L5
    [END]                                   1         4
EOF
